Start using Datacol

To get start you need to connect Datacol to your salesforce. We recommend you to first test out integration with sandbox environment.

Sandbox     Production
Clicking above will redirect you to salesforce for authentication, we only store salesforce access token not account credentials (username and password). if you need a free demo, please contact us.

Pricing plans

We have made our pricing plans simple.
Signup for free trial. You can upgrade, downgrade or cancel your account at any time.

Individual

0 / per month

  • Sandbox Connectivity
  • 5 salesforce objects
  • 1000 database rows
  • Email Support
Select plan

Small Teams

50 / per month

  • Sandbox Connectivity
  • Force API optimization
  • Unlimited salesforce Objects
  • Email and Chat Support
  • Free trial for 2 months
Select plan

Enterprise

200 / per month

  • Sandbox Connectivity
  • Force API optimization
  • Unlimited salesforce Objects
  • Cloud, on-premise database connectivity with VPN
  • OData Connector
  • Data Import/Export
  • Email and Chat Support
Select Plan

*Note: In case, we host database for you, your invoice will also include database provider charges after allowed number of rows.
